title: There is a Wall Behind the Shadow - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adult   Adventure   Comedy   Drama   Fantasy   Romance   Slice of Life   Yuri
tags: Acting   Apocalypse   Beautiful Female Lead   Calm Protagonist   Famous Protagonist   Female Protagonist   Late Romance   Modern Day   Power Couple   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Showbiz   Slow Romance   Survival   Transmigration
author: Yun Wang Ran   云惘然
description:
After winning the two Golden Planet Awards, The Movie queen , Yu Nian Bing went home and had just sat down on the chair and as soon as she took two bites of the sweet watermelon, the neighbor’s bedroom wall had collapsed into pieces. It was very hazy in the room next door and there was a lot of ash, charcoal, and dense smoke. A person laid in that room,She thought 'Isn't that the person who confessed to her to get on a hot search six months ago...?'

Some months later

Reporter: Teacher Yu what were you thinking at that time?

Teacher Yu: Hah, I didn’t even dare to think about it then.

This story is about a person with special abilities from an apocalypse world. She traveled To the interstellar world to get a wife from the entertainment field and mainly to be a participant in a reality show about the survival abilities in the wilderness and shootings in movies.




Author: This time I want to write a different type of reality show. Of course, you all can read and enjoy>
